com.phonegap.calendar.android.core
Class CalendarOps

java.lang.Object
  com.phonegap.calendar.android.core.CalendarOps

public class CalendarOps
extends java.lang.Object

All the methods designed in order to perform the calendar operations are static methods and will be called from this class

Author:
Sergio Martinez Rodriguez

findUserEvents

public static java.util.List<EventEntry> findUserEvents(CalendarClient client,
                                                        java.util.Date minStart,
                                                        java.util.Date maxStart)
Get the user selected calendar events between the specified dates

Parameters:
client - CalendarClient object with access to the User calendar
minStart - minimum start date (if null 1970-01-01T00:00:00)
maxStart - maximum start date (if null 2031-01-01T00:00:00)
Returns:
List of Events List

Updates the given calendar into selected user account in device

Parameters:
client - CalendarClient object with access to the User calendar

original - original CalendarEntry object that is going to be replaced
